Welcome to my research website.

```{r,echo=FALSE,results='asis'}
wflow_files <- fs::dir_ls("analysis",glob="*Rmd")
wflow_html_files <- fs::path("docs",fs::path_ext_set(fs::path_file(wflow_files),rep("html",length(wflow_files))))
wflow_names <- purrr::map_chr(wflow_files,~rmarkdown::yaml_front_matter(.x)$title)
wflow_strings <- glue::glue("[{wflow_names}]({wflow_html_files})")
cat(paste0(wflow_strings,collapse="\n\n"))
```
